text: Johor Bahru (also spelled Johor Baharu, Johor Baru,Baru means "new" and Johor means "Jewel" in Malay. or Johore Bahru; shortly as JB) is the capital city of Johor, Malaysia. Pasir Pelangi, the royal village, is located in Johor Bahru. The city in itself has a population of 1,334,188 as of 2010. The metropolitan area of Johor Bahru, also known as Iskandar Malaysia, has a population of 1,730,000. ==Notes== ==References== ==Bibliography== * * * * ==Other websites== * Official site of Johor Bahru City Council * * Johor Bahru Community Portal * Johor Bahru Events Category:Capital cities in Malaysia Category:Johor
title: Johor Bahru
